column5: I stopped in there this morning. Pulled it from the box. I wanted to see the blades. They are not the same quality as the original FB3. Cheaper and it only took me a split second to see this and said thanks, but no thanks. Yes they are curved, but there is only about a 1/4 inch of cutting blade, and yes, the price was the same as the FB 3. $119. This was the 6". I did buy more fly tie stuff, as it 20% off.  BPS had no stock of quality hand augers. Just their straight blade brand. Both stores were light with patrons.  With that said, I will be ice fishing Christmas day, somewhere.  Sorry pizan for not getting to you. Im a dumb ass.
Not to worry B when you seen one Itie, you’ve seen them all.
Thx, Brian, for saving me a trip. I intended to stop in tomorrow on the way to family. It looks like the jacked the price right back up too!!
I looked at it too , also padsed and paid full price for a finbore 3. Im ready to go now. Just need an invite from some of the pros on here to get the logistics down...
